A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It is the worst or next to worst Star Wars. DOes not fell like the middle of a trilogy\, this movie might have worked as episode 9 but as 8 it literally leaves NOTHING for episode 9. Just changes a age old character and kills off some new ones and old ones and a side plot that has nothing to do with the story. People actually booed in the theaters when I saw it during two or three scenes. Nothing fresh or new\, just a jumpled mess with no point but for the director/writer to throw out all the stuff from earlier star wars movies\, even TFA.  Never been this disappointed leaving a theater. It took me months to realize Episode one was bogus\, I realized this one was half way into this movie.  A man dressed up for the movie fell asleep duing it a few rows in front of me and his friends provided more enjoyment than did this WASTE of a movie. Get Johnson away from this franchise now\, or take it in the back and put it to sleep forever.
